## IMemPool.callocAs() method

Similar to [IMemPool.mallocAs()](./malloc.imempool.mallocas.md)<!-- -->, but if allocation was successful also clears the allocated block w/ `fill` value (default: 0).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
callocAs<T extends Type>(type: T, num: number, fill?: number): TypedArrayTypeMap[T] | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | <code>T</code> |  |
|  num | <code>number</code> |  |
|  fill | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TypedArrayTypeMap[T] | undefined`
